DOC.brief_summary: Good glycemic control is superior to poor glycemic control in reducing risk of interventricular septum thickness among fetuses of diabetic mothers
DOC.brief_title: Cardiac Septal Hypertrophy in the Fetus of Diabetic Mother and Its Effect on Postnatal Cardiac Function
DOC.detailed_description: Good glycemic control is superior to poor glycemic control in reducing risk of interventricular septum thickness among fetuses of diabetic mothers specially during third trimester of pregnancy
DOC.criteria: singleton pregnancy gestational age 36 weeks congenital anomalies obstetric complications medical disorders other than diabetes
